name: Elme Communities
description: Elme Communities is a real estate investment trust (REIT) focused on the acquisition, development, and management of multifamily residential properties in the Washington D.C. metropolitan area. Founded in 2014, the company aims to provide high-quality living spaces and exceptional service to its residents. Elme Communities operates a diverse portfolio of properties that cater to various demographics, emphasizing sustainability and community engagement. The company is committed to enhancing the living experience through innovative design, modern amenities, and a focus on resident satisfaction. With a strong emphasis on environmental responsibility, Elme integrates sustainable practices in its development and management processes. Elme Communities leverages technology to streamline operations and enhance resident interaction, ensuring that it stays at the forefront of the evolving real estate market. As a leading player in the multifamily sector, Elme Communities is dedicated to creating vibrant communities where residents can thrive.

seo.meta_title: Elme Communities | Multifamily Residential Real Estate Investment Trust
seo.meta_description: Explore Elme Communities, a leading REIT specializing in multifamily residential properties in the Washington D.C. area. Discover our commitment to quality living and community engagement.

faq.question: What does Elme Communities focus on?
faq.answer: Elme Communities focuses on the acquisition, development, and management of multifamily residential properties.

faq.question: Where is Elme Communities headquartered?
faq.answer: Elme Communities is headquartered in Chevy Chase, Maryland, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Elme Communities?
faq.answer: Drew D. D. McKenzie is the CEO of Elme Communities.
